title: This Gorgeous Kitchen Find at HomeGoods Is a Take on This 175-Year-Old Trend
description: The set comes with matching mugs and saucers. READ MORE...

All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.Credit: Chiociolla/ShutterstockThere’s always some type of little luxury you can find at HomeGoods, whether it’s a cute strawberry-shaped lamp, dainty bow plates, or peanut butter mochi. It’s a real challenge to visit the store without leaving with at least one thing. I know this very well because I recently bought new kitchen towels there, and spent an entire hour roaming the aisles; I wanted to put everything in my cart. One find I couldn’t stop obsessing over was an unbelievably gorgeous vintage espresso mug set.The espresso drinkware set in question boasts designs from the Victorian era, a time in Europe during the 19th century known for dainty china with intricate designs. If you head over to HomeGoods, you may be able to get your hands on this collection.One pack includes four espresso cups and four saucers for $12.99, making each piece in this collection about $3. The navy blue and white collection features an intricate design of varying plants and flowers, creating a collage-like pattern on the dishes. This vintage-inspired espresso serveware set is only available in stores. And with the holidays here, you’ll want to get it before it sells out (it would make an excellent gift for any coffee-lover in your life!).While we hope you can find this mug and saucer set, if you have trouble, try Amazon. You can buy a similar porcelain cup and saucer set that serves six people. The gorgeous serveware is blue and white and has a beautiful pattern. Whether you’re searching for holiday gifts or looking for a set to upgrade your morning coffee routine, you can never go wrong with vintage-style mug and saucer sets. This drinkware is stunning, and you can count on it to stay relevant once a new trend becomes popular. Buy: Floral Coffee Cups, Set of 6, $37.99 (normally $45.55)

Ashia Aubourg

From the moment I started remixing ramen noodles into gourmet meals and spending hours watching cooking shows as a puny six-year-old, I knew I found a deep passion for food. While I realized — after taking on a two-year high school internship in an award-winning kitchen — that a…read more

published about 4 hours ago

We independently select these products—if you buy from one of our links, we may earn a commission. All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.

There’s always some type of little luxury you can find at HomeGoods, whether it’s a cute strawberry-shaped lamp, dainty bow plates, or peanut butter mochi. It’s a real challenge to visit the store without leaving with at least one thing. I know this very well because I recently bought new kitchen towels there, and spent an entire hour roaming the aisles; I wanted to put everything in my cart. One find I couldn’t stop obsessing over was an unbelievably gorgeous vintage espresso mug set.

The espresso drinkware set in question boasts designs from the Victorian era, a time in Europe during the 19th century known for dainty china with intricate designs. If you head over to HomeGoods, you may be able to get your hands on this collection.

One pack includes four espresso cups and four saucers for $12.99, making each piece in this collection about $3. The navy blue and white collection features an intricate design of varying plants and flowers, creating a collage-like pattern on the dishes. 

This vintage-inspired espresso serveware set is only available in stores. And with the holidays here, you’ll want to get it before it sells out (it would make an excellent gift for any coffee-lover in your life!).

While we hope you can find this mug and saucer set, if you have trouble, try Amazon. You can buy a similar porcelain cup and saucer set that serves six people. The gorgeous serveware is blue and white and has a beautiful pattern. 

Whether you’re searching for holiday gifts or looking for a set to upgrade your morning coffee routine, you can never go wrong with vintage-style mug and saucer sets. This drinkware is stunning, and you can count on it to stay relevant once a new trend becomes popular. 

Buy: Floral Coffee Cups, Set of 6, $37.99 (normally $45.55)
